thread.title: A Customer Kindly Asked Not To Be Judged For Ordering Three Portions Of Mozzarella Sticks - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: A Customer Kindly Asked Not To Be Judged For Ordering Three Portions Of Mozzarella Sticks - BuzzFeed News

author: Tanya Chen
title: A Customer Kindly Asked Not To Be Judged For Ordering Three Portions Of Mozzarella Sticks - BuzzFeed News
text:
Fresco suspected the customer was extra excited because Fresco Fish & Chips had previously taken a hiatus from the delivery service Just Eat. “It was hilarious,” Fresco said. “I was excited to see it.”
ID: 10656087 3. Fresco sent the receipt around, where it was eventually posted, and has gone viral, on Reddit. Fresco said he just received another delivery of two orders of mozzarella sticks, where the customer was compelled to also explain themselves — jokingly. Fresco said the comment said something like “I’m not having a bad week, I’m just craving mozzarella sticks.”
He’s been entertained by the comment section of the delivery requests, but more importantly, he’s not judging.
ID: 10656290 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Tanya Chen is a social news reporter for BuzzFeed and is based in New York. Contact Tanya Chen at tanya.chen@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
